attributes.action: Enforce the legal adult age limit on companies such as public transport & travel agents. Also define legal ages for enfants, children & teenagers.
attributes.additional_details:
I believe that it is wrong that public transport companies such as Merseyrail & travel agents dictate their own age limits for tickets.

Other business' must obide by the legal adult age limit such as pubs & newsagents.

I propose that new age limits are defined for babies, enfants(young children), children & teenagers, which aswell as the current legal age for adults are enforced across all industries. Therefore stopping companies making up age limits.
